title: Introduction to Go Programming
summary: Learn the fundamentals of Go programming language, including syntax, data structures, concurrency, and best practices.
target_audience: Beginners who want to learn Go programming from scratch
learning_objectives:
- Understand Go syntax and basic concepts
- Work with Go data structures and types
- Write concurrent programs using goroutines and channels
- Build simple command-line and web applications
assumed_prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge in any language

title: Advanced Go Patterns
summary: Explore advanced patterns and techniques in Go, including interfaces, error handling, testing, and performance optimization.
target_audience: Intermediate Go developers looking to deepen their understanding
learning_objectives:
- Master Go interfaces and type assertions
- Implement effective error handling strategies
- Write comprehensive tests
- Optimize Go programs for performance
assumed_prerequisites: Solid understanding of Go basics and at least 6 months of Go experience
